conv_purpose: User creates a creatively themed poem and seeks feedback and improvements.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User requests a short poem about the changing seasons.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the dialogue by requesting a creative piece, specifically a poem about a given theme.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modifies the poem's style in the last round's prompt to make it more reflective and introspective.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'Refinement' structure where the user changes the style of the poem to align more closely with a desired tone.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the poem's themes and imagery discussed in the previous rounds to ensure they are captured effectively.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follows the 'Summary' structure where the user requests a consolidation of the poemâ€™s thematic elements and imagery.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).

conv_purpose: User creates a cohesive poem inspired by various art forms and seeks to compose and refine it through iterative feedback.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User requests a creative poem inspired by the visual arts, utilizing vivid imagery and metaphor.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt initiates the dialogue and sets the artistic theme of the conversation, focusing on creating a poem with inspiration from visual arts.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by asking to incorporate elements of another art form, such as music, into the poem for a richer artistic expression.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt follows the 'Follow-up' structure by building on the initial poem, introducing additional artistic elements to enhance it.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user seeks a summary of the content discussed in the previous rounds to create a final version of the poem that integrates both visual arts and musical elements.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt employs the 'Summary' structure by asking for a consolidation of the previously explored themes into a cohesive poetic piece.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).

conv_purpose: User aims to write a short story inspired by music, focusing on evoking emotional and imaginative expression.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: User requests a creative short story based on a specific piece of classical music, seeking a narrative that evokes the emotions and moods present in the composition.
summarized prompts.explanation: In this initial round, the user sets the scene by requesting a creative task that leverages a specific piece of music as inspiration, aligning with the general structure of a creative writing dialogue.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modify the length constraint included in last round's prompt to make the story more concise and impactful for better capturing the essence of the music within a shorter narrative.
summarized prompts.explanation: According to the refinement structure, the user changes the previous requirement by adjusting the length constraint, suggesting a more concise version, without changing the topic or adding new constraints.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).

conv_purpose: User aims to create a creative and engaging piece of writing for a story set in an imaginative world, and wishes to explore different narrative styles and perspectives.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user requests a short creative story set in a fantasy world featuring a young hero embarking on a quest.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt sets the initial framework for the dialogue, establishing the creative writing task focused on an imaginative and artistic story.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user modify the narrative style included in last round's prompt to make the story more suspenseful, aiming to increase reader engagement.
summarized prompts.explanation: The user employs the refinement structure by refining the style from the previous request, enhancing the narrative's suspense without changing the story's core theme or setting.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user follow the last round dialogue by requesting additional dialogue between characters to further build tension within the story.
summarized prompts.explanation: This follow-up prompt naturally develops the story by requesting more detailed interactions, building on the suspenseful style established earlier.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).

conv_purpose: User engages in a creative writing exercise to develop a detailed poem on a specific historical event in humanities.

summarized prompts.name: c1
summarized prompts.description: The user asks for an initial creative introduction to a poem based on the themes of a specific historical event in humanities.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt sets the stage for a creative writing exercise, focusing on artistic expression around a particular historical theme, fitting the structure of an initial inquiry that can be built upon.

summarized prompts.name: c2
summarized prompts.description: The user follows the last round dialogue by requesting additional vivid imagery and descriptive language to enhance the poem.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt exemplifies the 'follow-up' relation by adding more constraints to enrich the poetic expression, continuously building on the previous dialogue.

summarized prompts.name: c3
summarized prompts.description: The user recalls the initial poem theme and asks to incorporate a reflection on the impact of this historical event on contemporary society.
summarized prompts.explanation: This prompt captures the 'callback' relation by revisiting the original theme and integrating a new layer of reflection, connecting past discussions to a broader context.

conv_task: Creative Writing: Text with an emphasis on artistic expression and creativity (e.g., poems, short stories, scripts).
